backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (Article, CitizenPost, Comment, MediaItem, UserProfile) and backend logic including CRUD operations, role management via AccessControl/MixinAuthorization, and seed data initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (Privacy Policy page, Terms of Service page, footer link updates) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and notable recent changes such as color theme updates and new page additions.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark mode color tokens including background, foreground, primary, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React SPA with the page title set to 'Global Nexus', a logo favicon, and a root div that loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes including /privacy and /terms, wrapping the layout in a LanguageProvider.
frontend/src/components/ArticleCard.tsx: Reusable article card component supporting default and compact variants, displaying article image, title (with Hindi support), category badge, author, date, and a blue breaking-news badge.
frontend/src/components/ArticleManagemen: Admin component that displays a table of all articles with title, category, author, date, and breaking/featured flags, plus a form to create new articles.
frontend/src/components/BreakingNewsTick: Horizontally scrolling ticker bar that displays breaking news headlines (with Hindi support) fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/components/CategoryBadge.ts: Small colored badge component that renders a localized, styled label for a given article category.
Displays up to four article cards for a given category with a header, loading skeleton, empty state, and a 'view all' link.
Card component linking to a citizen post detail page, showing image, category badge, optional status badge, title, author, and date.
frontend/src/components/CitizenPostModer: Admin moderation panel listing all citizen posts with approve/reject action buttons for pending submissions.
Displays comments for an article or citizen post and provides an authenticated form to submit new comments.
frontend/src/components/CreateArticleFor: A form component for creating news articles with fields for title, body, author, category, and flags like breaking/featured, supporting both English and Hindi inputs with success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedHero.tsx: Displays a full-width hero banner for a featured article with a background image, gradient overlay, title, excerpt, and metadata; handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: A small toggle button that switches the app language between English and Hindi using the LanguageContext.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main app shell with a sticky header, category navigation links, mobile menu, authentication controls, breaking news ticker, and an Outlet for page content.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login or logout button using Internet Identity authentication, showing the user's profile name when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/MediaCard.tsx: Displays a media item card (video, podcast, or reel) with a thumbnail, type badge, hover play overlay, and a click handler to play or open the media.
frontend/src/components/PrincipalIdDispl: Shows the authenticated user's truncated Internet Identity principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter a display name to create their profile, blocking dismissal until submitted.
Renders up to three related articles from the same category as the current article, excluding the current one, using compact ArticleCard components.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Renders a sidebar with a 'Most Read' articles list and a 'Citizen Spotlight' section showing approved citizen posts, both linking to their respective detail pages.
frontend/src/components/SubmitStoryModal: A dialog modal form that allows authenticated users to submit a citizen story with title, body, category, and optional image URL, showing a success state after submission.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayerModal: A dialog modal that embeds a responsive 16:9 iframe video player for a given embed URL and title.
frontend/src/constants/translations.ts: Defines English and Hindi translation strings for all UI sections including navigation, auth, articles, citizen reports, admin, and common labels.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a React context for managing the active language ('en' or 'hi') with persistence via sessionStorage and toggle/set functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login, logout, identity, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating articles, citizen posts, and comments via the backend actor, including queries for breaking news, categories, comments, and mutations for creating/updating posts.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: A hook that returns the current language's translation object and language code by reading from LanguageContext and the translations constants.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for the Global Nexus color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page displaying a founder profile card with photo, bio, and credentials for Pawnesh Kumar Singh, the CEO of Global Nexus.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page that checks authentication and admin status, then renders tabbed panels for article management and citizen post moderation.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Article detail page that fetches all articles, finds the one matching the URL id, and renders the title, hero image, body, and comments section with language-aware content.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Category listing page that fetches articles by category from the URL param and displays them in a paginated grid with navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/CitizenNewsPage.tsx: Displays a filterable grid of approved citizen-submitted news posts with a header banner and a submit story modal for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/CitizenPostDetailPage: Shows the full detail view of a single citizen post by ID, including title, author, image, body, status badge, and a comments section.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main home page with a featured hero article, a sidebar, and per-category article sections for all defined categories.
frontend/src/pages/MultimediaPage.tsx: Displays media content (videos, podcasts, reels) in a tabbed layout with a video player modal for playback.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Static page rendering the Global Nexus privacy policy as numbered sections covering data collection, usage, security, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Static page rendering the Global Nexus Terms of Service as numbered sections covering user responsibilities, content submission, legal compliance, and more.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the Global Nexus frontend, defining custom colors (blue/black brand palette), fonts, border radii, shadows, and keyframe animations including a news ticker scroll.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot (version 11) describing the Global Nexus multilingual news platform's features, architecture, known issues, and existing feature inventory including nav, homepage, admin, multimedia, and legal pages.
